solution_line_template: Ahmed has {ahmed_apple_multiplier} times as many apple trees as Hassan who has {hassan_apple_trees} apple tree so Ahmed has {ahmed_apple_multiplier}*{hassan_apple_trees} = <<{ahmed_apple_multiplier}*{hassan_apple_trees}={ahmed_apple_trees}>>{ahmed_apple_trees} apple trees

Ahmed has {ahmed_orange_trees} orange trees in addition to the apple trees for a total of {ahmed_orange_trees}+{ahmed_apple_trees} = <<{ahmed_orange_trees}+{ahmed_apple_trees}={ahmed_total_trees}>>{ahmed_total_trees} trees
Hassan has {hassan_apple_trees}+{hassan_orange_trees} = <<{hassan_apple_trees}+{hassan_orange_trees}={hassan_total_trees}>>{hassan_total_trees} trees in his orchard
Ahmed has {ahmed_total_trees}-{hassan_total_trees} = <<{ahmed_total_trees}-{hassan_total_trees}={difference_in_trees}>>{difference_in_trees} more trees than Hassan
